question: The extent to which employees are happy or content with their work environment is known as which of the following in the service-profit chain model?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Customer loyalty means that the customer deliberately chooses to do repeat business with the company.
That’s not correct. External value proposition is the promise of value that a customer can expect a business to deliver.
That’s not correct. Internal service quality is defined as the quality of the services frontline employees receive from the rest of the organization.
Employee satisfaction is the extent to which employees are happy and/or content with their jobs and work environment.

detailedSolution: Employee satisfaction is the extent to which employees are happy and/or content with their jobs and work environment.
